shri lanka kala mandalaya,rate urumayak wu deshiya kalawa rakagena poshanaya kota ape ma kalakaru pirisak bihi kirimen jathiye abhimanaya nanwalima sadaha dayakawe.sanskruthika ha kala katayuthu amathyanshya magin me wasare sidukaranu labu wadasatahan bohoya ee athara,sigiriya wyapruthiyata wasara 30 k pirima nimiththen sigiriya nirmanaya kala nirmanashilpinta saha pera rajadaruwanta pin paminawime pirith pinkamak sigiriya kauthukagaraye di pawathwiya.sigiriye yatithala pahasukam nanwima sadaha sanskruthika amathyawaraya nirikshana charikawakada niyalini.mahanuwara yugayata ayath iparani smaraka sanrakshanayata gath piyawarak lesa sisilpanwala rajamaha wiharaye bana maduwa prathisanskaranaya kirima siduwiya.kilinochchiye thaipongal ulela mahath uthkarshawath lesa pawathwimada siduwa thibe.uthure awathan wu ha aabadhawalata lakwu daru dariyange kala kusalatha agayimada sanskruthika ha kala katayuthu aathyanshaya magin sidu kerini.aluth awurudu nakath pathraya janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wetha piliganwima sidukaranu labini.wariyapola - nathagane upa rajadhaniye pura widya kanim ha sanrakshana katayuthu arambaima ha ee magin purawidyathmaka watinakamakin yuth nagarayak nirmanaya kirima aarambha wiya.sinhala - hindu aluth awurudda wenuwen deshiya aahara sanskruthiya prawardhana jathika wada satahana migamuwedi pawathwini.janakala kendrey di pawathi, amathyanshaye sinhala hindu aluth awurudu ulela boho denekuge sahabhagithwayen pawathwini.
